title: Mid-level Software Engineer 2021-U-818 NEW!
full_description: Join ICES on a new contract supporting USGS as a Mid-level Software Engineer. These positions are located in Denver, CO.As a Mid-level Software Engineer, specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to:Duties:•    Design, modify, develop, write and implement software programming applications•    Support and/or install software applications and/or operating systems•    Participate in the testing process through test review and analysis, test witnessing and certification of software•     Apply limited experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.Required Qualifications:•    Bachelor’s degree in related technical or scientific field•    A minimum of 2-4 years demonstrated experience in the field or related areaDesired Qualifications:•    Master’s degree or higher in related technical or scientific fields•    Prior experience supporting USGS programs
